document_data.mainbody:
ewth Linnacker was the eldest living sibling of the head of the Linnacker patriar family of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
During the Absolute crisis of the , Mssr. Rewth Linnacker was invited to attend the art show titled "Strange Tides Self-Portraits from the Sword Coast," hosted by Lady Jannath in her Lower City estate. Rewth RSVPd to attend with a plus one guest.
